testimonials.text: Hardik has been a real pleasure to work with. Hardik did an exceptional job on projects that we worked together on. Passionate, great and creative co-worker. Detail oriented, intelligent, deadline oriented and broad-minded employee; has vast knowledge and is thorough. Thanks to interpersonal skills, Hardik has great relations with both company clients and potential customers. Is able to work in a fast-paced environment. Highly recommended.
